title: Provides that regulatory mandates imposed upon a school district shall not take effect until the subsequent school year
summary: Provides that regulatory mandates imposed upon a school district shall not take effect until the subsequent school year.

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  GUNTHER,  ZEBROWSKI,  REILLY, GALEF, JAFFEE,
         SAYWARD, TOBACCO, McKEVITT, CORWIN, KOLB, HOOPER -- Multi-Sponsored by
         -- M. of A. BOYLAND, CALHOUN, CONTE, CROUCH, GABRYSZAK, GIGLIO,  RAIA,

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to regulatory mandates

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. The education law is amended by adding a new section 308-a
    2  to read as follows:
    3    S 308-A. REGULATORY MANDATES. 1. AS USED IN THIS SECTION,  "REGULATORY
    4  MANDATE"  MEANS  ANY RULE, REGULATION, ORDER, OR ADMINISTRATIVE GUIDANCE
    5  BY THE BOARD OF REGENTS, COMMISSIONER, OR AN EMPLOYEE OF THE  DEPARTMENT
    6  THAT  REQUIRES  A  SCHOOL  DISTRICT  TO CREATE A NEW PROGRAM, REQUIRES A
    7  HIGHER LEVEL OF SERVICE FOR AN EXISTING PROGRAM, OR ALTERS A PROGRAM  OR
    8  A  SERVICE  IN  A MANNER THAT INCREASES THE OPERATIONAL COST TO A SCHOOL
    9  DISTRICT.
   10    2.  IN THE EVENT THAT A REGULATORY MANDATE THAT IMPOSES A COST UPON  A
   11  SCHOOL DISTRICT AND IS ACTED UPON OR PROMULGATED BY THE REGENTS, COMMIS-
   12  SIONER,  OR AN EMPLOYEE OF THE DEPARTMENT AFTER THE ADOPTION OF A SCHOOL
   13  BUDGET, SUCH REGULATORY MANDATE SHALL NOT TAKE EFFECT UNTIL  THE  SUBSE-
   14  QUENT SCHOOL YEAR FOR WHICH SUCH SCHOOL BUDGET WAS ADOPTED.
   15    3.  NOTWITHSTANDING  SUBDIVISION  TWO  OF  THIS  SECTION, A REGULATORY
   16  MANDATE MAY BE IMPOSED IF:
   17    (A) THE REGULATORY MANDATE IS PROVIDED AT THE  OPTION  OF  THE  SCHOOL
   18  DISTRICT  UNDER  A  REGULATION,  RULE, ORDER, OR ADMINISTRATIVE GUIDANCE
   19  THAT IS PERMISSIVE RATHER THAN MANDATORY;
   20    (B) THE REGULATORY MANDATE IS REQUIRED BY, OR ARISES FROM,  AN  EXECU-
   21  TIVE ORDER OF THE GOVERNOR EXERCISING HIS OR HER EMERGENCY POWERS; OR
   22    (C)  THE  REGULATORY MANDATE IS REQUIRED BY STATUTE OR EXECUTIVE ORDER
   23  THAT IMPLEMENTS A FEDERAL LAW  OR  REGULATION  AND  RESULTS  FROM  COSTS

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02363-01-1

       A. 1707                             2

    1  MANDATED  BY  THE  FEDERAL  GOVERNMENT  TO  BE BORNE AT THE LOCAL LEVEL,
    2  UNLESS THE STATUTE OR EXECUTIVE ORDER IMPOSES  COSTS  WHICH  EXCEED  THE
    3  COSTS MANDATED BY THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT.
    4    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.
